pages.text: Hydrogen is a carrier of energy.  It is produced by putting water in an $(l:block/electrolytic_separator)Electrolytic Separator$(/l), and can be used as fuel in a Gas-Burning Generator, as well as a $(l:item/jetpack)Jetpack$(/l) or $(l:item/jetpack_armored)Armored Jetpack$(/l) and $(l:item/flamethrower)Flamethrower$(/l).
It is also used in a $(l:block/chemical_infuser)Chemical Infuser$(/l) to make $(l:gas/hydrogen_chloride)Hydrogen Chloride$(/l).
